transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello haan ji.
Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello haan ji, haan bataiye.
Executive: Ek do din se
Customer: dikkat aa rahi hai sir mobile app pe na ye IndiaMART ka application open nahi ho raha hai sir.
Executive: Kya issue aa raha hai usme?
Customer: Sir mobile app open nahi ho raha hai us pe leads vagarah kuch nahi dikha raha hai wo bas refresh refresh dikha raha hai kuch ho nahi raha hai us pe.
Executive: Aap ek bar isi number pe ek bar whatsapp send kar dijiye.
Customer: Sir office to sara abhi off hai. Monday ko main check karke bata paunga.
Executive: Kyunki aisa koi glitch abhi mere pass aaya nahi hai. Ek bar update aap kar lijiyega application ko.
Customer: Update bhi kar liya sir. Update ke baad hi to ye dikkat hua na.
Executive: Ek bar sir ek bar mere ko aap whatsapp pe screenshot bhej dijiye. Jo aap open karke na jo bhi aapko kuch error vagarah kuch dikha raha hoga. Wo ek bar send kar dijiye. Main backend team se ek bar update karke bata deta hu. Warna agar kuch mere ko aur jyada kuch issue
Customer: bas open kuch nahi ho raha hai sir.
Executive: Error nahi dikha raha kuch bhi.
Customer: Aap kaun si company se baat kar rahe hai abhi?
Executive: Mexa Innovation se.
Customer: Kaun si sir?
Executive: Mexa Innovations.
Customer: Mexa Innovations. Wait kar lijiye.





Executive: Maine sir abhi request aage dal diya hai. Baki ek bar main Monday ko sab check karke bata paunga. Kyunki abhi to off hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Chaliye thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai. Aap sir mera number note down kar lijiye. Ek bar whatsapp pe screenshot dal dijiyega mere ko. So that main aur personally ek bar check kar kya hoga jab hona to Monday ko hi hai sir aap chutti manao sir. Hamara mat dekho dhyan. 247 aap bata rahe ho customer service hai kaun sa hai sir?

Executive: Sir to office pahunch ke main ek bar check kar lunga sir. Saturday Sunday off rehta hai but still aapne phone kara mere ko raat mein fir bhi hum phone pick up kar rahe hai. Aisa nahi ho ki aapko koi response nahi mil raha hai sir.
Customer: kya fayda sir?
Executive: Thik hai sir ek bar application aapko dikkat hui hogi application update chal rahi hogi. Lekin do teen din se yahi pareshani chal rahi hai.
Executive: Sir ye mere pass aapka hi concern aaya but application chal rahi hai sir. But ek bar aapko live ek bar video call kar raha hu. Aap ek bar abhi aapko resolution chahiye main try karta hu. Aapko main ek bar video meet ka link send kar raha hu ek bar join kariye aap.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ji line pe rahega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's IndiaMART application is not opening.

- No leads are visible on the app.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to share screenshot on WhatsApp.

- Executive shared number to send screenshot.

- Executive shared video meet link to join.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive will check on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- application, screenshot, video call, leads
